contenu:
I had the pleasure of working with √âric and can confidently say he is one of the most reliable and dedicated professionals I‚Äôve collaborated with. His serious approach and commitment to delivering top-quality work always stood out, especially when facing complex challenges. √âric has an exceptional ability to analyze problems quickly, identify the right solutions, and communicate them in a clear and structured way that brings the whole team forward.

What I appreciated most was his sense of mentoring. He always took the time to share knowledge, offer guidance, and provide thoughtful feedback. His support played an important role in my own development, and I am grateful for the professional growth it enabled.

√âric brings together expertise, a strong problem-solving mindset, and the human qualities of a true mentor ‚Äî a combination that makes him a standout colleague in any environment.

It is always great to partner with Eric. When it comes to build business, he is always a key player to support opportunities: mastering his topic, great champion builder, always giving meaningful feedbacks. Eric is a clear added-value for any team he is working with. On top of that, he is a very appreciated person you can enjoy with!

I have worked alongside Eric for a year at Datarobot and it was a real pleasure to do so for a few reasons. First of all he made my job as sales a lot easier by being extremely involved in the sales cycles, being very organised on what needed to happen, building the right relationship with the right people, thinking strategically about opportunities.
He is a very good relationship builder because he is very humble, genuine and a great professional that you want to spend time with.
He is very strategic in the way he organises and analyses opportunities and this really was very beneficial to our prospects and customers.
I would absolutely recommend Eric and I hope I can work with him in the future again.

¬´ Solution oriented ¬ª is what comes to my mind when I think about Eric. No matter how big or small the circumstance, Eric always finds a way to get things done and done right. I had the pleasure of working with Eric at DataRobot in the EMEA PreSales team.
